tool_description: API that fetches the latest blogs from dev.to website
name: dev-to-api
title: dev-to-api

api_list.name: Get the top articles of all time
api_list.description: It returns the top articles of all time from dev.to website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dev-to-api1.p.rapidapi.com/articles/top/infinity"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dev-to-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
